about_the_game:
Are you ready to soar through the skies like never before? 'Pro Flight Simulator' delivers the most thrilling and realistic flight experience out there! Choose from five incredible aircraft, including two agile hydroplanes perfect for water landings, a powerful army jet for heart-pounding high-speed missions, and a mighty jumbo jet built for epic journeys.

With stunningly realistic exterior and cockpit views, you’ll feel like a true pilot as you switch between multiple camera angles to find that perfect perspective. Fly through 40 challenging levels, each set in one of 10 beautifully crafted sceneries, from snow-covered mountain ranges to the vast deserts of North Africa. Every mission brings new challenges, and changing wind conditions will keep you on your toes as you navigate through turbulent skies with, on high-end devices, different weather conditions (fog, rain, storm) that add complexity to planes control.

Your mission? Collect valuable goods hanging beneath air balloons while you masterfully steer your aircraft through ever-changing skies. Think you’ve mastered the challenge? Take on the 'World Tour', an epic journey that will take you around the globe, pushing your skills to the limit as you conquer familiar landscapes with new, unpredictable weather patterns.

Strap in, take the controls, and make every flight an adventure with 'Pro Flight Simulator'! The sky's the limit—are you ready to reach for it?

XBox Controller or Mouse/Keys

name: Pro Flight Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
